verses.verse: וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> I lifted up עֵינַ֛י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> again and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and behold a man וּבְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand חֶ֥בֶל <S%H2256><s%> line מִדָּֽה׃ <S%H4060><s%> with a measuring

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אָ֖נָה <S%H575><s%> Where אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> Whither הֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> I Whither goest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thou? And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me לָמֹד֙ <S%H4058><s%> unto me To measure אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see כַּמָּֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what רָחְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7341><s%> [is] the breadth וְכַמָּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> is and how אָרְכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H753><s%> thereof and what [is] the length

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And behold the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֖י יֹצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> with me went forth וּמַלְאָ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> angel אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> and another יֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> went out לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7125><s%> to meet

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֵלָ֔ו <S%H413><s%> to him רֻ֗ץ <S%H7323><s%> unto him Run דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> young man הַלָּ֖ז <S%H1975><s%> to this לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying פְּרָזוֹת֙ <S%H6519><s%> [as] towns without walls תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem מֵרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of men וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and cattle בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> therein

וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּהּ֙ נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> For I saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God ח֥וֹמַת <S%H2346><s%> will be unto her a wall אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וּלְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and will be the glory אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst פ

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> ho וְנֻ֛סוּ <S%H5127><s%> [come forth] and flee מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land צָפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for כְּאַרְבַּ֞ע <S%H702><s%> as the four רוּח֧וֹת <S%H7307><s%> winds הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven פֵּרַ֥שְׂתִּי <S%H6566><s%> for I have spread you abroad אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> thyself O צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion הִמָּלְטִ֑י <S%H4422><s%> Deliver יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that dwellest בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> [with] the daughter בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> After כָּב֔וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory שְׁלָחַ֕נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath he sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> me unto the nations הַשֹּׁלְלִ֣ים <S%H7997><s%> which spoiled אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for הַנֹּגֵ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> you for he that toucheth בָּכֶ֔ם נֹגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> you toucheth בְּבָבַ֥ת <S%H892><s%> the apple עֵינֽוֹ׃ <S%H5869><s%> of his eye

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵנִ֤יף <S%H5130><s%> For behold I will shake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> upon them and they shall be a spoil לְעַבְדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5650><s%> bondage וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁלָחָֽנִי׃ <S%H7971><s%> hath sent ס

רָנִּ֥י <S%H7442><s%> Sing וְשִׂמְחִ֖י <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> behold בָ֛א <S%H935><s%> for lo I come וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֥י <S%H7931><s%> and I will dwell בְתוֹכֵ֖ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> of thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְנִלְווּ֩ <S%H3867><s%> shall be joined גוֹיִ֨ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֤ים <S%H7227><s%> And many אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> and will become לִ֖י לְעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and shall be my people וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֣י <S%H7931><s%> and I will dwell בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וְיָדַ֕עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> of thee and thou shalt know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְנָחַ֨ל <S%H5157><s%> shall inherit יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah חֶלְק֔וֹ <S%H2506><s%> his portion עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> land הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy וּבָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> and shall choose ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and will again בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

הַ֥ס <S%H2013><s%> Be silent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> O all flesh מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נֵע֖וֹר <S%H5782><s%> for he is raised up מִמְּע֥וֹן <S%H4583><s%> habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> out of his holy ס
